overview:
Jody brings to WineTasteTV over 8 years of experience in television production and management. She has tackled a wide range of production challenges both on location and in the studio while servicing clients as diverse as BBC America, Coors Brewing, TLC and NBC. She has managed the day-to-day operations of major network promotion departments, directed design and animation teams and consulted with internal corporate production departments on improving their business. Jody brings the perfect combination of organizational skills and industry know-how necessary to keep the WineTasteTV team on track.

Source: WineTastetv.com
